intermediate.question: ArrayList vs LinkedList?
options: Dynamic array vs Doubly linked list
intermediate.explanation: ArrayList: fast access; LinkedList: fast insert/delete.

senior.question: Java Memory Model?
senior.explanation: Heap for objects, Stack for frames.

senior.question: Garbage Collection roots?
options: Active threads, Static vars, Local vars

senior.question: Fail-Fast vs Fail-Safe?
options: Exception on mod vs Copy iteration

expert.question: JIT Compilation?
options: Bytecode to Native code at runtime

intermediate.question: useRef purpose?
options: Access DOM / Persist value without re-render

intermediate.question: Controlled Component?
options: Form data handled by React state

intermediate.question: React.memo?
options: Memoize component (skip render if props same)

senior.question: Higher-Order Component (HOC)?
options: Function taking component, returning new one

senior.question: Error Boundaries?
options: Catch JS errors in child tree

senior.question: Portals?
options: Render children into different DOM node

entry.question: What is Node.js?
options: JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 engine

entry.question: What is a Callback?
options: Function passed as argument to handle result

intermediate.question: process.nextTick()?
options: Runs before next event loop phase

intermediate.question: What is libuv?
options: Library for async I/O and event loop

intermediate.question: Unhandled Rejection?
options: Crash or warning for caught promise error

senior.question: Event Loop Phases?
options: Timers, Pending, Idle, Poll, Check, Close

senior.question: setImmediate vs setTimeout(0)?
options: Immediate runs in Check phase; Timeout in Timers

senior.question: Node Single Threaded?
options: Yes, but uses libuv thread pool for IO
senior.explanation: Event loop is single; IO is pooled.

entry.question: Foreign Key?
options: Link to Primary Key in another table

intermediate.question: Inner Join?
options: Returns matching rows in both tables

intermediate.question: Having vs Where?
options: Having filters groups; Where filters rows

intermediate.question: Union vs Union All?
options: Union removes duplicates; All keeps them

intermediate.question: What is an Index?
options: Data structure to speed up retrieval

intermediate.question: Truncate vs Delete?
options: Truncate resets table (fast/DDL); Delete removes rows (DML)

senior.question: Explain Deadlock.
options: Two processes waiting for each other

expert.question: Write-Ahead Logging (WAL)?
options: Log changes before writing to disk

expert.question: Query Execution Plan?
options: Steps taken by engine to execute query

intermediate.question: git fetch vs pull?
options: Fetch downloads refs; Pull downloads & merges

intermediate.question: git rebase?
options: Reapply commits on top of another base tip

intermediate.question: Resolve conflict?
options: Edit file, git add, git commit

intermediate.question: Hard reset?
options: Moves HEAD, resets staging & working (destroys changes)

senior.question: git reflog?
options: Log of HEAD updates (recover lost commits)

senior.question: Detached HEAD?
options: HEAD points to commit, not branch

senior.question: Worktrees?
options: Multiple working trees from one repo

expert.question: Fast-forward merge?
options: Move pointer (no commit) vs Merge commit

entry.question: Region vs AZ?
options: Geo area vs Data Center cluster

senior.question: Shared Responsibility Model?
options: Security OF cloud vs IN cloud

expert.question: Well-Architected Framework Pillars?
options: Operational Excellence, Security, Reliability, Performance, Cost, Sustainability

expert.question: Lambda Cold Starts?
options: Latency for init new execution env

expert.question: Multi-Region Active-Active?
options: Traffic served from multiple regions simultaneously

expert.question: Savings Plans vs Reserved Instances?
options: Flexible usage commitment vs Specific instance commitment

expert.question: Nitro System?
options: Underlying platform for next-gen EC2 (Hypervisor offload)

expert.question: Control Tower?
options: Automate setup of multi-account environment (Landing Zone)

expert.question: Global Accelerator?
options: Route traffic through AWS global network

entry.question: What is Docker?
options: Platform for developing, shipping, and running applications in containers

entry.question: Image vs Container?
options: Image is template (read-only); Container is running instance

entry.question: Dockerfile?
options: Text document with commands to build an image

entry.question: What is a Pod?
entry.explanation: Group of one or more containers.

intermediate.question: Liveness vs Readiness Probes?
options: Restart if dead vs Route traffic when ready

intermediate.question: ReplicaSet?
options: Ensures specified number of replicas run

senior.question: StatefulSet vs Deployment?
options: Stable identity/storage for stateful apps vs Stateless

senior.question: Persistent Volume (PV) vs PVC?
options: Storage resource vs Request for storage

senior.question: Sidecar Pattern?
options: Helper container running alongside main container

senior.question: Horizontal Pod Autoscaler (HPA)?
options: Scales replica count based on CPU/Memory

expert.question: etcd?
options: Distributed key-value store for cluster state

expert.question: GitOps (ArgoCD)?
options: Git as source of truth for declarative infrastructure

expert.question: Custom Resource Definition (CRD)?
options: Extending K8s API with new types

entry.question: Test Case?
options: Set of conditions/inputs and expected results

entry.question: Positive vs Negative Testing?
options: Valid input (expect success) vs Invalid input (expect error)

entry.question: White Box Testing?
options: Testing with knowledge of internal code

intermediate.question: Regression Testing?
options: Ensuring changes didn't break existing functionality

intermediate.question: Smoke Testing?
options: Basic health check of critical features

intermediate.question: Defect Life Cycle?
options: New -> Assigned -> Open -> Fixed -> Verified -> Closed

senior.question: Test Pyramid?
options: Strategy: Many Units -> Some Integration -> Few UI

senior.question: TDD (Test Driven Development)?
options: Write test -> Fail -> Write code -> Pass

senior.question: Code Coverage?
options: Metric of code executed by tests

expert.question: Chaos Engineering?
options: Testing resilience by intentionally breaking system

expert.question: Mutation Testing?
options: Modifying code to check if tests fail (kill mutants)

expert.question: Performance Engineering vs Testing?
options: Proactive architecture design vs Reactive measurement
